material: cast iron core with neoprene/vinyl-style coating
usage: Strength training, toning and sculpting arms, shoulders and back, general home or gym exercise workouts.
key_features: Cast iron dumbbells are neoprene-coated for durability
Coating helps protect the user, floor and other fitness equipment
Help tone and sculpt arms, shoulders and back
Hexagonal shape for easy stacking and roll-free use
Washable dumbbell, able to be washed without damage
Color coded thick vinyl-style coating for comfortable and non-slip feel (same product line)
Hexagon shaped edges for easy storage and to prevent rolling
ai_description: A matching pair of bright orange hexagonal KAKSS dumbbells, each clearly marked “3 KG” on the end. The compact cast-iron weights are fully coated in a smooth, grippy neoprene-style finish that protects floors and prevents rolling, giving them a clean, modern gym look.
target_audience: Home and gym users looking for compact free weights, including beginners and fitness enthusiasts who want durable, easy-grip dumbbells.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (3KG ORANGE PAIR)
